basics.name: Kamal Joshi
basics.label: Project Lead Solvative
basics.summary: Strategic Project Lead with 15+ years of experience in IT project delivery and technical leadership. Proven track record of delivering complex software solutions, leading cross-functional teams, and aligning engineering execution with business goals. Highly skilled in Agile methodology, stakeholder engagement, risk mitigation, and end-to-end project execution.

coreskills.label: Project & Product Delivery
coreskills.description: Project Scheduling, Sprint Planning, Agile (Scrum), Backlog Grooming

coreskills.label: Leadership & Team Management
coreskills.description: Cross-functional team leadership, mentorship, resource planning

coreskills.label: Technical Oversight
coreskills.description: Software development lifecycle (SDLC), quality control, CI/CD, integration

coreskills.label: Risk & Scope Control
coreskills.description: Risk identification, mitigation planning, scope definition & validation

coreskills.label: Tools & Technologies
coreskills.description: JavaScript, PHP, CSS, Jira, Git, Agile tools

coreskills.label: Architectures
coreskills.description: Micro-services, Backend APIs, IoT integration platforms

work.name: Solvative
highlights: Led multiple enterprise and IoT-driven product initiatives for international clients
Overseeing Agile delivery across logistics platforms, industrial device systems, and IoT security solutions.
Acted as the primary bridge between business stakeholders and technical teams, ensuring predictable delivery, quality outcomes, and stakeholder satisfaction.

work.name: iFlair Web Technologies
highlights: Led a team of fullstack JavaScript developers
Worn multiple hats such as System Administrator, Sr. Web Developer, JavaScript expert

work.name: iFlair Web Technologies
highlights: Worked on multiple technologies including PHP open sources - Magento 1, WordPress, Drupal, Typo3, etc. & PHP Frameworks - Symfony 2, Laravel 5+, CodeIgniter, etc. & mobile technologies - Cordova, PhoneGap, NativeScript & Native OS
Worked on JavaScript MEAN & Meteor projects.

projects.name: RhinoSEC — IoT-Enabled Security Application
projects.overview: Developed an IoT platform variant used to integrate Wi-Fi door sensors with backend logic to identify and alert on security threats for school buildings.
contributions: Defined project deliverables, collected stakeholder requirements, and converted them into user stories with prioritized backlogs.
Managed Agile sprint schedule with daily scrums and weekly client reviews for visibility and alignment.
Balanced risk related to IoT communication, latency, and alerting; devised mitigation plans and testing strategies.
Led a focused team of 3 engineers, coordinated with hardware vendors, and oversaw real-time sensor integration workflows.

projects.name: NET Platform - Transportation Management System (TMS)
projects.overview: Led Agile delivery of an enterprise logistics platform with carrier integrations, shipment tracking, invoicing, and dashboards, ensuring high-quality releases and stakeholder alignment.
contributions: Led end-to-end Agile delivery of a logistics management platform involving carrier integrations, shipment tracking, invoicing, dashboards, and admin controls.
Owned project integration management, coordinating frontend, backend, and API development while maintaining alignment with business priorities.
Facilitated backlog grooming and sprint planning, translating stakeholder requirements into well-defined user stories and ensuring validated scope delivery.
Managed sprint schedules through daily stand-ups, sprint reviews, and retrospectives, adapting plans based on velocity, risk, and feedback.
Coordinated third-party integrations with LTL carriers (e.g., CRST, XPO, YRC, ABF), resolving vendor-specific issues impacting production systems.

projects.name: PMC - Industrial Device & Monitoring Platform
projects.overview: Led Agile delivery of an industrial monitoring platform integrating Pivot and Chiller devices, coordinating firmware, backend, and frontend teams to ensure reliable releases.
contributions: Managed Agile delivery for an industrial monitoring solution integrating Pivot and Chiller devices with web-based dashboards and analytics.
Directed project work across backend, and frontend teams, ensuring synchronization of deliverables and dependency management.
Facilitated sprint execution while managing scope adjustments caused by hardware dependencies and architectural constraints.
Engaged stakeholders through regular demos, mock-ups, and milestone check-ins, incorporating feedback from live field events and client reviews.

projects.name: ShirteeJS — Custom Print Design & eCommerce Application
projects.overview: Delivered a complete custom design & e-commerce platform that enables designers to visualize print layouts on multiple products (T-shirts, shoes, mugs, etc.) and support seamless order workflows.
contributions: Led end-to-end Agile delivery from concept to production, including functional breakdown, sprint planning, technical reviews, and backlog refinement.
Defined and managed project scope, schedule, and quality standards; facilitated daily stand-ups, sprint retrospectives, and milestone reviews.
Orchestrated team of 8 developers/designers, promoted coding standards, and ensured feature readiness through acceptance criteria and testing.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines, oversaw infrastructure decisions, and established monitoring for performance and security.
Delivered multiple applications including vendor design tool, backend services for image processing, customer storefront, and e-commerce backend.
